ygData.subject: [ANN] Heritrix 1.14.0 now available
ygData.msgSnippet: The official Heritrix 1.14.0 release is now available at Sourceforge:

Subject: [ANN] Heritrix 1.14.0 now available
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=9_0121j7yGWagN85Sb2mruCnfFIt5D4o6YjRNU2j0G4J

The official Heritrix 1.14.0 release is now available at Sourceforge:

http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=73833&package_id=73980&release_id=595427

Release 1.14.0 adds a number of small features to the Heritrix 1.x line,
most notably upgrading support for the WARC archived-web-content format
to version 0.17 (ISO Committee Draft). This release also includes 41 bug
fixes or other incremental improvements, including several based on
community contributions or requests.

The only change from the Release Candidate of last month is the removal 
of the 'RC1' identifier. This is expected to be the last major release 
on the 1.X line; while a 1.14.1 (etc.) bugfix release is possible, most 
attention will be on the 2.X line, especially work towards a 2.2 major 
release.

Online release notes for 1.14.0 are available at:

http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix/Release+Notes+-+1.14.0

Project bug/issue tracking is in a JIRA-based system:

http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER

The project wiki is at:

http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix

If you register to report/comment on JIRA issues, the same login will
work for wiki edits and comments.

- Gordon @ IA
